titles.title: Lumbee Recognition Act
A bill to provide for the acknowledgment of the Lumbee Tribe of North Carolina, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary:
1/18/2007--Introduced.
Lumbee Recognition Act - Amends federal law relating to the Lumbee Indians of North Carolina to extend federal recognition to the Lumbee Tribe of North Carolina.
